translation.en: Just so you know, you're ruining my life.
translation.es: Para que sepas,me estás arruinando la vida.

translation.en: Well, thank you for sharing. Where's your uncle?
translation.es: Gracias por contarme. ¿Dónde está tu tío?

translation.en: I don't know. The string I tied to him broke.
translation.es: No sé. Le até una cuerda y se rompió.

translation.en: Chill with the smart mouth, okay?
Whoo! Told you. Right on time. Y'all ready?
translation.es: Te lo dije. Justo a tiempo. ¿Están listos?

translation.en: Come on. Let's ride. Let's make some miles.
I was just saying some last-minute goodbyes.
Really? 'Cause you smell like you've been smoking weed.
What? You tripping. That's my new body spray.
What is this? TSA? Come on. I ain't getting on no plane.
translation.es: ¿Eres de la policía?Vamos. No me subiré a un avión.

translation.en: And body search is a violation of my basic human rights.
translation.es: Y cachearme es una violaciónde mis derechos humanos.

translation.en: Reggie, you promised. No drugs and no weed for the entire trip.
translation.es: Reggie, lo prometiste.Nada de drogas en todo el viaje.

translation.en: And I intend to honor that pledge.
Good thing the trip ain't started yet.
Cameron, the train's leaving the station in two minutes.
translation.es: Cameron, nos vamos dentro de dos minutos.

translation.en: -I'm not going. -I'm sorry to hear that.
translation.es: - No iré.- Lamento que lo digas.

translation.en: I guess you're moving in with the next family that lives here?
translation.es: ¿Vivirás con la familia que se mude aquí?

translation.en: What if they don't like stinky-head boy smell?
translation.es: ¿Y si no les gusta el olor de tu cabezota?

translation.en: They're picking it up in 20 minutes.
Come on, little man. We got to go.
-Hey. -Come on, just give me a hit.
Now what kind of uncle shares a joint with his teenage niece?
translation.es: ¿Qué tío comparte un porrocon su sobrina adolescente?

translation.en: The kind sitting right in front of me.
translation.es: Uno como el que está junto a mí.

translation.en: I assume you're bringing a back-up supply.
[scoffs] No, it's my last jay until we get to Houston.
translation.es: No, es el último hasta llegar a Houston.
Se lo prometí a tu mamá.

translation.en: You, being a man of your word?
Don't be giving me no attitude, okay? And don't be giving it to your mom.
translation.es: No te hagas la viva conmigo.Y tampoco con tu mamá.

translation.en: Why? It's her fault we have to move.
translation.es: ¿Por qué?Es su culpa que debamos mudarnos.

translation.en: Nah. Nah. Listen, shit happens, Kelly.
translation.es: No. Mira, las cosas malas pasan, Kelly.

translation.en: your mom's been doing everything in her power to hold this family together.
translation.es: tu mamá ha hecho todo lo posiblepara mantener unida a esta familia.

translation.en: She's paying for all this… It just got to be too much.
translation.es: Debe costarle mucho mantener todo esto.
Nada se siente bien sin él.

translation.en: -Y'all on the road yet? -No, not yet. Just, um…
taking one last look around the house before we go.
translation.es: Solo miraba la casa por última vez.

translation.en: I figured two nights on the road.
Be at your place, uh, probably by Friday.
translation.es: Llegaremos a tu casa el viernes.

translation.en: Call me if you need anything.
-Yeah, I'll call you on the way. -Travel safe.
translation.es: - Te llamaré por el camino.- Ve con cuidado.

translation.en: Cam, come on! Get your scrawny butt out here.
Now, we not stopping between here and Arizona.
translation.es: No nos detendremos entre aquí y Arizona.

translation.en: -So if you got to go, now is the time. -Mom, can we just leave?
translation.es: - Si tienen que ir al baño, vayan ahora.- ¿Podemos irnos?

translation.en: Come on, you know the drill. Come on, y'all. Come on.
Bring it in, let's get together.
If you don't act like family, I will leave you behind. Promise?
translation.es: - Actúa como de la familia o te quedas.- ¿Lo prometes?

translation.en: please bless and protect us on our journey
translation.es: bendícenos y protégenos durante el viaje

translation.en: In your name, we pray. Amen.
Please tell Señor Cross we are grateful for his assistance.
translation.es: Díganle al señor Crossque agradecemos su ayuda.

translation.en: Mr. Cross will be happy to see this.
translation.es: Al señor Cross le alegrará ver esto.
Nosotros nos arriesgamos,y él recibe las ganancias.

translation.en: Mr. Cross gets to keep all the profit. Seem fair to you?
translation.es: Nosotros nos arriesgamos,y él recibe las ganancias. - ¿Te parece justo?- Si no te gusta, díselo al señor Cross.

translation.en: You don't like the arrangement, talk to Mr. Cross.
translation.es: - ¿Te parece justo?- Si no te gusta, díselo al señor Cross.

translation.en: Otherwise, shut the fuck up, bro. [laughing]
You do this and you're a dead man.

translation.es: A la mierda el Sr. Cross.

translation.en: Nobody has said a word in three and a half hours.
translation.es: Nadie ha dicho una palabraen tres horas y media.

translation.en: And I was hoping we could be like other families
translation.es: Esperaba que pudiéramos sercomo otras familias

translation.en: Because that's what families do on car trips.
translation.es: Porque eso hacen las familiascuando viajan.

translation.en: Yeah, I know, right? It's crazy.
But people joke, they sing songs. They…
translation.es: Pero la gente bromea, canta canciones.

translation.en: No, that's what they do in the movies.
translation.es: No, eso lo hacen en las películas.

translation.en: Yeah, uh, Mom, I think you've mistaken this for 1983.
translation.es: Sí, mamá, creo que eso lo hacían en 1983.

translation.en: That's it. Everybody put your phones away. I'm serious.
translation.es: Se acabó.Guarden sus teléfonos. Hablo en serio.
Te explicaré algo.Ese teléfono es un privilegio, Kelly.

translation.en: It's a privilege, Kelly. Don't give me a reason to take it away.
translation.es: Te explicaré algo.Ese teléfono es un privilegio, Kelly. No me des motivos para quitártelo.

translation.en: There you go, my man. All right, go, Cam.
My declarative statement is moving to Texas sucks.
translation.es: Declaro que mudarse a Texas apesta.

translation.en: [laughs] I agree. Look at that! End of conversation, right?
translation.es: Estoy de acuerdo. Se acabó la charla, ¿no?
- Así es.- Está bien. Como quieran.

translation.en: You know how many times I had to move growing up?
translation.es: ¿Saben cuántas veces me mudé de pequeña?

translation.en: -[Cam, Kelly, Reggie] 27. -27 different military bases in 17 years.
translation.es: Veintisiete. Así es, 27 bases militares en 17 años.

translation.en: -Your dad was an army colonel. -[woman] But he was a great dad.
translation.es: - Tu papá era coronel del ejército.- Y un gran papá.

translation.en: He taught us how to hunt, how to shoot, how to fight, and when not to.
translation.es: Nos enseñó a cazar, a disparar,a pelear y cuándo no pelear.

translation.en: Hey, look. I know how you feel.
Whenever my dad asked us to move, I got angry too.
translation.es: Yo también me enojabacuando debíamos mudarnos.

translation.en: Question is, do any Black people live in Houston or will it just be us?
translation.es: Dime, ¿en Houston viven negroso seremos los únicos?

translation.en: Do any Black people live in Houston? What?
You ain't heard of Megan Thee Stallion? Yes, you have. I know you have.
translation.es: ¿No conoces a Megan Thee Stallion?Sé que sí.

translation.en: -You need to study hip-hop. Anyway… -Too young for that.
translation.es: - Debes estudiar hiphop.- Es muy pequeño.

translation.en: There are a lot of Black people in Houston.
Whoa, hey. Wait, wait, wait. Sis, sis. Eyes ahead. Eyes ahead.
-Ah, what the hell is this? -[worker] Slow down, please.
This is gonna cost us some time.
[Reggie] Knew I shoulda brought my weed.
This is some serious Area 51 shit out here.
Y'all know what happens next, right?
The car's gonna stall out, then we'll get hit by a tractor beam, and lifted up in a UFO.
translation.es: El auto se detendrá,y un rayo tractor nos subirá a un OVNI.

translation.en: Next, we'll be strapped down on our stomachs
translation.es: Luego los álienes nos amarrarán boca abajo

translation.en: with big-eyed aliens probing our ass.
-They won't do that to you, Uncle Reggie. -Why not?
translation.es: - A ti no te lo harán, tío Reggie.- ¿Por qué no?

translation.en: 'Cause the aliens only want to study intelligent life-forms.
translation.es: Porque los álienes quieren estudiarformas de vida inteligentes.

translation.en: You know what? Because you're my nephew, I'll let that slide.
translation.es: Te lo dejaré pasar porque eres mi sobrino.

translation.en: Bren, he's too smart for his own good.
-What you gonna do with this brain power? -Tell me about it.
translation.es: - ¿Qué harás con esa capacidad?- Ni que lo digas.

translation.en: Intelligence can be such a burden sometimes.
translation.es: A veces,la inteligencia puede ser una carga.

translation.en: Yeah. Especially to the people around you. [Reggie] Wait, wait, wait.
translation.es: - Sí. Sobre todo para los que te rodean.- ¿Cómo?

translation.en: Is this Throw Shade at Reggie Day? Y'all ganging up on me.
translation.es: ¿Es el día de insultar al tío?Se alían contra mí.

translation.en: That's it. No more Snickers for none of y'all.
translation.es: Se acabó. No más chocolates para ustedes.

translation.en: -You're our teddy bear. -Get off. Get off me.
Whatever. I just ain't lived up to my full potential yet.
translation.es: Como sea. Aún no he alcanzadomi máximo potencial.

translation.en: One day, I'm going to surprise every damn body.
translation.es: Un día los sorprenderé a todos.

translation.en: [clerk] You get detoured off the interstate?
[clerk] You intend to stop and stay around here?
-Hey, Mom, can I have a Red Bull? -No. We're leaving.
translation.es: - ¿Me compras un Red Bull?- No. Nos vamos.

translation.en: Mom! How many dead bugs did I find on the windshield? Guess.
translation.es: Adivina cuántos bichosencontré en el parabrisas.

translation.en: Oh! Just… throw that away. Go get in the car right now.
translation.es: Tira eso. Sube al auto ahora mismo.

translation.en: -Reggie, wake up. -[man 1] Open up, I'm right here.
Pull over. Come on, get out.
Sis, what you do to piss the good old boys off, huh?
translation.es: ¿Qué hicistepara molestar a los chicos buenos?

translation.en: …like you can't see me. I'm right here.
translation.es: …como si no me vieras. Estoy aquí.

translation.en: -It's my fault, I'm sorry. -What are you talking about?
translation.es: - Es mi culpa, perdón.- ¿De qué hablas?

translation.en: They were… They were hitting on me at the gas station and being nasty,
translation.es: Coquetearon conmigoen la gasolinera, fueron groseros,
así que les hice fuck you.

translation.en: Why would you do that? Didn't you see where we were?
translation.es: ¿Por qué lo hiciste?¿No viste dónde estábamos?

translation.en: Kelly, don't you ever do that again.
translation.es: Kelly, no vuelvas a hacer eso.

translation.en: -I know. -It's a different world out here.
translation.es: - Lo sé.- Es otro mundo aquí.

translation.en: I don't know, but we're not waiting to find out.
translation.es: No lo sé, pero no lo averiguaremos.

translation.en: Ah, shit. Yeah, we in it now.
Hell, I won't stay in the car and let these lanky-ass white boys start shit.
translation.es: No me quedaré aquímientras esos flacuchos nos molestan.
- Por favor, déjame a mí.- Claro que no.

translation.en: There's not a lot I do well, but this, I do damn well.
translation.es: No hago muchas cosas bien, pero esto sí.

translation.en: No! You explode, then they react? Then what's gonna happen to my--
translation.es: ¡No! Si tú estallas y ellos reaccionan,¿qué les pasará a mis…?

translation.en: Please. I can't take that risk.
[sighs] No. No. Your mom is going to handle it.
Okay, boys. You've had your fun.
Now what do I have to do to get you to move that truck?
translation.es: ¿Qué tengo que hacerpara que muevan la camioneta?

translation.en: Unless you want us to make your whole family apologize.
translation.es: A menos que quieraque obliguemos a su familia a disculparse.

translation.en: -Don't you come near my family. -Then say it like you mean it.
translation.es: - No se acerquen a mi familia.- Entonces, dígalo en serio.
por poner en peligro sus vidas.

translation.en: Oh, lady, you know we was just fucking with you.
What, Reggie, you got something to say? You got a comment now that it's all over?
translation.es: Reggie, ¿tienes algo que decir?¿Quieres opinar ahora que se acabó?

translation.en: We can make it to Tucson by seven o'clock.
translation.es: Podemos llegar a Tucson a las siete.

translation.en: Yeah, it's two hours and ten minutes.
translation.es: Sí, está a dos horas y diez minutos.

translation.en: -What you know about this? -[Kelly] I like this song.
Those guys today, were they going to hurt us?
translation.es: ¿Esos tipos de hoy iban a lastimarnos?

translation.en: They were mean, stupid white boys
translation.es: Eran chicos blancos malos y tontos

translation.en: doing what mean, stupid white boys do.
translation.es: actuando como chicos blancosmalos y tontos.

translation.en: 'Cause technically, we don't have a home.
translation.es: Porque, técnicamente, no tenemos un hogar.

translation.en: It's not your job to worry about things like that.
translation.es: Tú no debes preocuparte por esas cosas.

translation.en: It's your job to be a kid and it's my job to be your mom,
translation.es: Tú tienes que ser un niño,y yo tengo que ser tu mamá

translation.en: and make sure that you and your sister are taken care of. Okay?
translation.es: y cuidarlos a ti y a tu hermana. ¿Sí?

translation.en: Will we ever have a home again?
But, you know, a house ain't a home.
translation.es: Pero una casa no es un hogar.

translation.en: Home is us. You, Kelly, Reggie, me.
translation.es: Nosotros lo somos: tú, Kelly, Reggie y yo.

translation.en: As long as we're together, none of us are ever homeless.
translation.es: Mientras estemos juntos,siempre tendremos un hogar.

translation.en: It's okay, it's all right. I know. We all miss him too.
translation.es: No pasa nada. Lo sé.Yo también lo extraño.

translation.en: [sighs] I hate this. Can I just sleep in the car or something?
translation.es: Odio esto. ¿Puedo dormir en el auto?

translation.en: Why? Look, this room is ugly and there's zero privacy.
translation.es: ¿Por qué? Esta habitación es feay no hay privacidad.

translation.en: -She wants to FaceTime Zac and be kissy. -Shut it, pipsqueak.
translation.es: - Quiere mandarse besitos con Zac.- Cállate, mocoso.

translation.en: -Mom, she called me a pipsqueak. -Yeah, you are.
translation.es: - Mamá, me llamó mocoso.- Sí, lo eres.

translation.en: You're, like, half the size you should be at your age.
translation.es: Mides la mitadde lo que deberías medir a tu edad.

translation.en: Y'all are getting on my last nerve.
Family announcement. Nobody, I mean, nobody go in that bathroom for at least two hours.
translation.es: Anuncio para la familia: que nadieentre al baño por al menos dos horas.

translation.en: Probably smart to wear a hazmat suit too. Just a fair warning.
translation.es: Quizá necesiten usarun traje protector. Les advierto.

translation.en: You know what? Everybody just get some sleep.
We got a long day ahead of us on the road tomorrow.
translation.es: Nos espera un largo día de viaje.

translation.en: Yeah, like I'll sleep when Reggie starts snoring.
translation.es: No puedo dormircon los ronquidos de Reggie.

translation.en: -Hey! You know I don't snore. -And Kim Kardashian's butt is real.
translation.es: - Yo no ronco.- Y el trasero de Kim Kardashian es real.

translation.en: Uncle Reggie, on the Richter scale, you're an 8.5.
translation.es: Tío Reggie,en la escala de Richter, eres un 8.5.

translation.en: Oh, we throwing stuff? You want some too, sis?
You don't want none of this. You want some?
Okay, let's just go back to sleep.
-[Cam] Okay. -We don't want to get kicked out.
translation.es: - Bien.- No queremos que nos echen.

translation.en: -Boy, if you don't go to sleep… -Okay.
translation.es: - Si no te duermes…- Está bien.

translation.en: That sounded like it came from next door.
translation.es: Parece que viene de al lado.

translation.en: What the hell is going on? Somebody throwing a party or something?
-It's four in the morning, Reg. -That's when the best parties get started.
translation.es: - Son las cuatro de la mañana.- Cuando empiezan las mejores fiestas.

translation.en: -No, no, no, this sounds like a fight. -What?
-That definitely ain't no party. -[Cam] I'm scared.
translation.es: - Eso no es una fiesta.- Tengo miedo.

translation.en: I'm not letting this go on.
I'm a ER nurse. For all we know, some woman is getting beat by a man.
translation.es: Soy enfermera. Un hombrepodría estar golpeando a una mujer.

translation.en: -You gonna get caught in the middle? -[muffled shouting]
I know a gunshot when I hear one. That was definitely a gunshot.
translation.es: Reconozco un disparo. Eso fue un disparo.

translation.en: -Somebody could be dead in there. -I better check.
translation.es: - Podría haber muerto alguien.- Iré a mirar.

translation.en: Kelly, call 911. There's a man with a gunshot wound to the throat.
translation.es: Llama al 911. Hay un hombrecon un disparo en el cuello.

translation.en: No time, he's gonna bleed out.
Sir? Sir, I'm a nurse. My name is Brenda, I'm gonna help you.
translation.es: ¿Señor? Soy enfermera.Me llamo Brenda, lo ayudaré.

translation.en: Reg, go to the bathroom, get me some more towels.
translation.es: Reg, ve al baño y tráeme unas toallas.

translation.en: I've called 911. Help is on the way. I'll take care of you.
translation.es: Llamé al 911.La ayuda está en camino. Yo lo cuidaré.

translation.en: All right, just hang on. Hang on. Hang on!
Sir, you're going to be okay.
Stay with me. Stay with me.
Look at me! Look at me, sir. Come on. Hang on!
We haven't touched anything. We waited for you.
[officer] The witnesses next door reported a fight.
translation.es: Los testigos de al ladoreportaron una pelea.

translation.en: Harvey Ruck. Enforcer and bagman for Mr. Cross.
translation.es: Harvey Ruck.Matón y camello del señor Cross.

translation.en: An informant of mine says that Ruck and his partner Pepe Ochoa
translation.es: Un informante me dijoque Ruck y su socio, Pepe Ochoa,

translation.en: were supposed to deliver a payoff to Mr. Cross from the Sinaloa Cartel.
translation.es: debían entregarle al señor Crossun soborno del cartel de Sinaloa.

translation.en: Looks like Ruck went independent, canceled Pepe's ticket.
translation.es: Parece que Ruck se abrió y asesinó a Pepe.

translation.en: Do you think the cartel caught him? We didn't find any money.
translation.es: ¿Cree que el cartel lo atrapó?No hallamos dinero.

translation.en: [Hammers] Reasonable assumption, or Cross did it.
translation.es: Podría ser. O quizá fue Cross.

translation.en: Man's had his hand in every dirty deal that ever went down in this part of the world.
translation.es: Participa en todos los negocios suciosde este lado del mundo.

translation.en: I've been chasing that slippery son of a bitch for years.
translation.es: Llevo años persiguiendoa ese escurridizo hijo de puta.

translation.en: I want to talk to the folks staying next door.
translation.es: Quiero hablar con la gente de al lado.

translation.en: Nice family of four. I let them go, sir.
translation.es: Linda familia de cuatro. Los dejé ir.

translation.en: Yes, sir, just before you arrived. But I got their statements.
translation.es: Sí, antes de que usted llegara.Les tomé declaración.

translation.en: If that family can ID the killer's voice,
translation.es: Si esa familiapuede identificar la voz del asesino,

translation.en: And you'll have four more murders on your conscience.
translation.es: Y tendrás cuatro asesinatos másen tu conciencia.

translation.en: I need to talk to that family.
[Kelly] How come Reggie gets to drive and I don't?
translation.es: ¿Por qué Reggie puede conducir y yo no?

translation.en: Because you only have a learner's permit for California.
translation.es: Porque solo tienesuna licencia provisional para California.

translation.en: Reggie probably doesn't even have a license.
What? Hold… Hold… Hold on. I got plenty of licenses.
-Are they valid? -Yes. I don't know what you talking about.
translation.es: - ¿Son válidas?- Sí. No sé por qué lo dices.

translation.en: Mrs. Freeman, I'm Capt. JD Hammers of the Arizona State Troopers.
translation.es: Señora Freeman, soy el capitán Hammersde la Policía de Arizona.

translation.en: I'm in command of the homicide investigation
translation.es: Estoy al mandode la investigación del homicidio

translation.en: It appears I missed you by a minute. I need you to come back.
translation.es: Llegué un minuto luego de que se fueran.Necesito que regresen.

translation.en: I just want to get my family as far away from that motel as possible.
translation.es: Quiero alejar a mi familia de ese motel.

translation.en: It was a gruesome thing you witnessed.
If you pull over, I'll meet you somewhere.
translation.es: Si se detienen, iré a encontrarlos.

translation.en: I need to ask you some follow-up questions.

translation.es: Les conté todo a sus oficiales.

translation.en: Look, Captain… [softly] …I can't talk right now.
translation.es: Mire, capitán, no puedo hablar ahora.

translation.en: I have your number. I promise I'll call you as soon as I can talk.
translation.es: Tengo su número.Lo llamaré en cuanto pueda hablar.

translation.en: -Ma'am, you don't-- Ma'am! -Have a good day.
Got a bad feeling about this.
We're… We're not going back, are we?
-I think you got the wrong number. -Don't hang up, Brenda.
translation.es: - Creo que se equivocó de número.- No cuelgues, Brenda.

translation.en: -How do you know my name? -Boss man wants his money, Brenda.
translation.es: - ¿Cómo sabe mi nombre?- El jefe quiere su dinero, Brenda.

translation.en: You took his money and he wants it back.
translation.es: Tienes su dinero, lo quiere de vuelta.

translation.en: I don't know what you talking about. Don't call me back anymore.
translation.es: No sé de qué habla. No vuelva a llamarme.

translation.en: Talking about how I took her money. Probably trying to scam me.
translation.es: Me dijo que tomé su dinero.Seguro quería estafarme.

translation.en: [chuckles] I ain't got nothing for 'em to scam.
[Reggie] I mean, think about it, double-quarter-pound burger.
How come they ain't got the guts to call it a half-pounder?
-I know that look, little brother. -What look?
Something's going on with you. You get twitchy and darty.
translation.es: Algo está pasando. Te pusiste nervioso.

translation.en: -My eyes ain't darty. -You darty right now.
translation.es: - No estoy nervioso.- Sí lo estás.

translation.en: Like when you got a secret or you about to tell a lie. What's up?
translation.es: Como si ocultaras algoo fueras a mentir. ¿Qué pasa?

translation.en: All right. All right. All right.
I was going to surprise you once we got to Houston.
All my life, everybody say I'm the family fuck-up, right?
translation.es: Toda mi vida dijeronque era el desastre de la familia, ¿no?

translation.en: -No comment. -This time, Reggie ain't the problem.
translation.es: - Sin comentarios.- Esta vez, Reggie no es el problema.

translation.en: The Lord is our savior, fell out the sky right into our laps.
translation.es: El Señor es nuestro salvador,cayó del cielo a nuestras manos.

translation.en: He stashed it under the bathroom sink.
translation.es: Lo escondió bajo el lavabo del baño.

translation.en: It's gotta be drug money, right? I figured this dude is deader than shit.
translation.es: Debe ser dinero de drogas. Pensé que, como el tipo estaba muerto,

translation.en: He can't use this money, but I know a needy family who can.
translation.es: no podría usar el dinero,pero una familia que conozco sí.

translation.en: Have you lost your damn mind?
Bren, the dude was dead. I mean, like his heart had stopped.
translation.es: El tipo estaba muerto.Su corazón se había detenido.

translation.en: I'm a nurse! I know what a dead dude is.
translation.es: ¡Soy enfermera! Sé lo que es un muerto.

translation.en: You thought you were just gonna take this, and make our lives better?
translation.es: ¿Creíste que tomarías estoy mejorarías nuestras vidas?

translation.en: -This money could save our lives. -It can end our lives!
translation.es: - Este dinero podría salvarnos la vida.- ¡O acabar con ella!

translation.en: Bren, just say thank you. Stop looking on the dark side.
translation.es: Solo di gracias.Deja de mirar el lado oscuro.

translation.en: We could turn around and go back to Los Angeles right now. Save the house and everything.
translation.es: Podríamos volver a Los Ángeles,recuperar la casa y todo.

translation.en: You stole money from a crime scene, Reg.
translation.es: Robaste dinero de una escena del crimen.

translation.en: The voice on the phone, he killed that man for this money.
translation.es: La voz en el teléfonomató a ese hombre por este dinero.

translation.en: And their boss knows we have it. He knows who we are!
translation.es: Y su jefe sabe que lo tenemos.¡Sabe quiénes somos!

translation.en: He ain't coming back for this.
What if he does? Huh? You gonna turn into some street gangster?
translation.es: ¿Y si lo hace? ¿Te convertirás en gánstery dejarás la subgerencia del restaurante?

translation.en: Instead of the assistant manager at Chick-fil-A?
translation.es: ¿Te convertirás en gánstery dejarás la subgerencia del restaurante?

translation.en: Hey, that's an elite position. Okay? I had to work my way up to that.
translation.es: Es un puesto privilegiado.Trabajé duro para llegar ahí.

translation.en: You know how many drug tests I had to pass? That hurt.
translation.es: ¿Sabes cuántas pruebas de drogastuve que pasar? Fue duro.

translation.en: No. You call the police, they'll arrest the whole damn family.
translation.es: Si llamas a la policía,arrestarán a toda la familia.

translation.en: They'll say we the ones that murdered him to rip his shit off.
translation.es: Dirán que lo asesinamos para robarle esto.

translation.en: You want to risk the lives of those two kids?
translation.es: ¿Quieres arriesgar la vida de los niños?

translation.en: -Don't pick it up. -Get… Reggie, get… get off!
We have your money. We want to give it back.
I'm not gonna tell you that.
Worried about your family? You should be.
Look, you'll get your money back, but it'll be on my terms, okay?
translation.es: Recuperará su dinero,pero será bajo mis condiciones, ¿sí?

translation.en: I thought about what you said.
You're right. You have every right to be angry.
translation.es: Tienes razón.Tienes derecho a estar enojada.

translation.en: Let's just keep half the money.
[Kelly] Yeah, in the very next room.
translation.es: Sí, en el cuarto de al lado.

translation.en: Yeah, Zac, he was murdered. I mean, there was blood everywhere.
translation.es: Sí, Zac, lo mataron.Había sangre por todos lados.

translation.en: [distorted voice] This is our game, Brenda. You don't make the rules. Mr. Cross does.
translation.es: Este es nuestro juego.El señor Cross pone las reglas.

translation.en: The bag is in room 33 at the Center Star Inn.
translation.es: El bolso está en la habitación 33del hotel Center Star.

translation.en: It's in the closet on the top shelf.
translation.es: En el estante de arriba del armario.

translation.en: The key will be under the mat outside the door.
translation.es: La llave estarábajo la alfombra de la entrada.

translation.en: Yeah, let's hurry up back on the road to nowhere.
translation.es: Sí, rápido, sigamos yendo a ninguna parte.

translation.en: I was getting some tourist brochures. Check it out.
translation.es: Fui a buscar folletos turísticos. Míralos.

translation.en: We're seeing a whole new part of the country.
translation.es: Estamos en una parte del paísque no conocemos.

translation.en: Maybe we should take advantage of it. You know, soak up some culture.
Look, after last night, I just think we all need to relax and breathe a little.
translation.es: Después de lo de anoche, creoque debemos descansar y respirar un poco.
Volver a sentirnos como gente normal.

translation.en: Ain't nothing normal about this place.
translation.es: Este lugar no tiene nada de normal.

translation.en: [announcer] Howdy, folks. Welcome to Old Bravo.
translation.es: Hola, amigos. Bienvenidos a Viejo Bravo.

translation.en: The town where the Wild West never dies!
translation.es: ¡El pueblodonde el Lejano Oeste nunca muere!

translation.en: [Reggie] Brenda, you my big sister, I love you.
translation.es: Brenda, eres mi hermana mayor, te amo.

translation.en: But you definitely just messed up the best thing that ever happened to us.
translation.es: Pero arruinastelo mejor que nos ha pasado.

translation.en: That money would've got rid of all our problems.
All money is not good money, Reg.
translation.es: No todo el dinero es para bien.

translation.en: You damn right that's Jake talking. You gonna bring up my dead husband?
translation.es: Claro que Jake diría eso.¿Te meterás con mi esposo muerto?

translation.en: Jake was a hero, Jake was a god, 'cause Jake always did what was right.
translation.es: Jake era un héroe, Jake era un dios,Jake siempre hacía lo correcto.

translation.en: And remind me what good it did Jake
translation.es: Recuérdame lo bien que le hizo a Jake

translation.en: when he needed chemo and radiation, didn't have the money for it.
translation.es: no poder pagarla quimioterapia y la radiación.

translation.en: You got the money by getting yourself so far in debt you lost your house.
translation.es: Lo hiciste endeudándote tantoque perdiste tu casa.

translation.en: -You a asshole, you know that? -Yeah, I know it.
translation.es: Eres un imbécil, ¿sabes? Sí, lo sé.

translation.en: I've known it my whole life.
translation.es: Lo he sabido toda mi vida.

translation.en: You know what? Maybe I am just an assistant manager at Chick-fil-A.
translation.es: Que solo sea subgerente de un restaurante

translation.en: That don't mean I don't have my own dreams too.
translation.es: no significaque no tenga mis propios sueños.

translation.en: I was just trying to make things better.
I love you and those kids.
translation.es: Los amo a ti y a los niños.

translation.en: I wasn't trying to hurt nobody.
Seems like every day the man upstairs is testing us.
translation.es: El de arribanos pone a prueba todos los días.

translation.en: Mom, I'm not a little kid anymore.
And there's a duel happening. Come on down!
translation.es: y está por ocurrir un duelo. ¡Vengan!

translation.en: [distorted voice] Last person who took Mr. Cross for a fool is dead.
translation.es: El último que engañó al señor Crossestá muerto.

translation.en: The money is there. It's in the room.
translation.es: El dinero está ahí. En la habitación.

translation.en: You have something of his, Brenda.
-And now Mr. Cross has something of yours. -[muffled screaming]
translation.es: Y ahora el señor Cross tiene algo tuyo.

translation.en: He's here. Cross is here. Go find Cameron. Bring him straight to the car.
translation.es: Cross está aquí.Ve a buscar a Cameron. Llévalo al auto.

translation.en: -What is wrong? -Don't ask questions, just do as I say.
translation.es: - ¿Qué pasa?- No preguntes, haz lo que digo.

translation.en: Cam! Cam, you in there, little buddy? Come on.
Come on, little man, let's boogie. We gotta roll.
-Are you gonna tell me what's going on? -Just Just get in the car right now.
translation.es: - ¿Me dirás qué está pasando?- Sube al auto ahora mismo.

translation.en: Please, just don't hurt him, okay?
[Cross] Call the police, or fuck with me again,
translation.es: Si llamas a la policíao vuelves a joderme,

translation.en: and I'll grab your daughter next.
Please, for the love of God, just don't do this.
translation.es: Por el amor de Dios, no haga esto.

translation.en: You have two hours to retrieve my money.
translation.es: Tienes dos horas para buscar mi dinero.

translation.en: Then bring it back to Old Bravo and call me.
translation.es: Tráelo a Viejo Bravo y llámame.

translation.en: -Cam? -Swear to God, if he hurts that boy…
translation.es: - ¿Cam?- Juro que si lastima al niño…

translation.en: I gotta get back to that motel and get the money.
translation.es: Debo ir al motel a buscar el dinero.

translation.en: Reggie will explain it to you but right now I gotta go.
translation.es: Reggie te explicará, pero debo irme.

translation.en: Go where? Where are you going?
I got to get Cam, but I need to leave you here.
translation.es: Iré por Cam, pero debes quedarte aquí.

translation.en: No! No, no, no! He's my brother, I'm coming with you.
Listen to me. I cannot worry about you and your brother and do this.
translation.es: No puedo preocuparme por tiy tu hermano y hacer esto.

translation.en: Just wait for me, I'll call you.
I got you. I got you.
You better not hurt my baby.
translation.es: Más vale que no lo lastimes.

translation.en: In pursuit of a speeding Chevy Suburban. Headed westbound, east of Old Bravo town.
translation.es: Voy tras un Chevy Suburbandirección oeste, al este de Viejo Bravo.

translation.en: [woman] Capt. Hammers, we got a hit on your plate request
translation.es: Capitán Hammers, la patente que buscasalió de Viejo Bravo.

translation.en: coming out of Old Bravo. Driver is a female, Black.
translation.es: Capitán Hammers, la patente que buscasalió de Viejo Bravo. Es una mujer negra.

translation.en: This is State Trooper Captain Hammers. She's a witness.
translation.es: Habla el capitán Hammers. Es una testigo.

translation.en: If the cartel or Cross spot you, they'll kill her. Fall back.
translation.es: Si el cartel o Cross lo ven,la matarán. Aléjese.

translation.en: [crying] The last three months of my life have felt like a bad nightmare
translation.es: Los últimos tres meses de mi vidahan sido como una pesadilla

translation.en: I can still feel him, Reggie.
Like Daddy isn't dead, you know?
translation.es: Como si papá no hubiera muerto.

translation.en: I can hear his voice and I can see his face.
translation.es: Puedo oír su voz y puedo ver su rostro.

translation.en: And I don't… And I don't want to let that go.
[sobbing] I don't want to lose him.
Your dad is always going to be with you. You hear me?
And your mom's going to get Cam back. I promise.
translation.es: Y tu mamá recuperará a Cam. Lo prometo.

translation.en: Reggie, come on. Please tell me what's going on.
I see you! Where you going?
Give me back my bag, you little thief!
Whoa. Just… Just… put that down.
I'll blow your ass back to Africa.
translation.es: Te devolveré a África de un tiro.

translation.en: This woman here, she stole my property, but I got it back now.
translation.es: Esta mujer robó algo que me pertenece,pero ya lo recuperé.

translation.en: So I'll just go get my car and go now. I don't want any trouble.
translation.es: Así que buscaré mi auto y me iré.No quiero problemas.

translation.en: It looks like you got it.
Look, I don't have time for this.
Hey, show me what's in the bag.
translation.es: Muéstrame qué hay en el bolso.

translation.en: This is Brenda, please leave it at the tone.
translation.es: Habla Brenda,deja tu mensaje después del tono.

translation.en: [voice wavering] Mom, uh, we are at Lucky 13 restaurant, right outside of Old Bravo, okay?
translation.es: Mamá, estamos en el restauranteTrece de la Suerte, junto a Viejo Bravo.

translation.en: Reggie just told me everything and I'm really scared.
translation.es: Reggie me contó todo y estoy muy asustada.

translation.en: Captain Hammers of the Arizona State Troopers.
translation.es: Capitán Hammers,de la Policía Estatal de Arizona.

translation.en: that took place last night at the Sunset Motel.
translation.es: que ocurrió anoche en el motel Sunset.

translation.en: I didn't spot y'all at Old Bravo so I figured you'd be here.
translation.es: No los vi en Viejo Bravo,supuse que estarían aquí.

translation.en: There's no place else to eat for miles.
translation.es: No hay otro restaurante en kilómetros.

translation.en: -Sir, we already talked to the police. -I know.
translation.es: - Señor, ya hablamos con la policía.- Lo sé.

translation.en: Darling, bring me a big old glass of iced tea, extra sweet, lots of ice.
translation.es: Cariño, tráeme un vaso grandede té helado extradulce, con mucho hielo.
Y tú debes ser el tío.

translation.en: Hmm. Which accounts for two of you.
Now, as to your mom and brother,
translation.es: En cuanto a tu mamá y tu hermano,

translation.en: your mom was last seen driving south of here like a bat out of hell.
translation.es: a tu mamá la vieron por última vezcorriendo como loca hacia el sur.

translation.en: Um, he was with her, sir.
Probably didn't see him because he's little for his age.
translation.es: Quizá no lo vioporque es pequeño para su edad.

translation.en: Now, how about we cut the bullshit?
There's a fortune in missing drug money.
translation.es: Hay una fortuna perdidaproveniente de la droga.

translation.en: And if your mom's got it, she's in a whole world of danger.
translation.es: Si tu mamá la tiene,está en grave peligro.

translation.en: Because it either belongs to the Sinaloa Cartel,
translation.es: Porque le pertenece al cartel de Sinaloa

translation.en: a man who's the most dangerous criminal in the Southwest.
translation.es: el delincuente más peligroso del sudoeste.

translation.en: You want to see your mom and brother alive again?
translation.es: ¿Quieres volver a vera tu mamá y a tu hermano vivos?

translation.en: You need to tell me where they are.
[panting] My brother's been kidnapped. Can you please help us?
Best place to lie low is my ranch.
translation.es: El mejor lugar para escondersees mi rancho.

translation.en: Mom should have called us by now.
SUV's been trailing us for the last five miles.
translation.es: Una camioneta nos ha seguidolos últimos ocho kilómetros.

translation.en: I slow down, he slows down. I speed up, he speeds up.
translation.es: Si voy más despacio, él también.Si acelero, acelera.

translation.en: I don't think he'd get his hands dirty like this.
translation.es: No creo que se ensucie las manos así.

translation.en: Might be one of his goons.
translation.es: Quizá sea uno de sus matones.

translation.en: But I'm gonna ask you both to duck down in your seats.
-[uncocks gun] -You can come up for air.
Sorry to scare you like that, but I had to be sure.
You think that dude is gonna try and smoke my sister and nephew?
translation.es: ¿Cree que ese tipo intentará matara mi hermana y mi sobrino?

translation.en: I'm not gonna let that happen.
Yo, Mace! Look who's all woke up.
Big Mama wants some action too.
Once you go white, you ain't ever walking right. [laughing]
translation.es: Lo haces con un blanco,el resto es un espanto.
- Déjenme ir.- Me rompió la nariz.

translation.en: Let me go or I'll snap her scrawny red neck.
translation.es: Déjenme ir o le rompo el escuálido cuello.

translation.en: Do it. That's one less slut.
-[Brenda] No! No! Please. Please. -[man] Get the bag!
-Here you go, Mace. -[Brenda] That's my bag.
I need that money to get my son back.
translation.es: Necesito ese dineropara recuperar a mi hijo.

translation.en: Don't give two shits about your son.
translation.es: Tu hijo me importa una mierda.

translation.en: Yeah, fuck her! Yeah, she won't use that gun.
translation.es: ¡Sí, al diablo con ella! No disparará.

translation.en: Mace, bitch shot off my leg!
I missed! I was aiming for your balls.
I got one more shot in this gun. Who wants it?
translation.es: Me queda un tiro. ¿Quién lo quiere?

translation.en: The money in that bag belongs to Mr. Cross.
translation.es: El dinero en ese bolsole pertenece al señor Cross.

translation.en: I wonder what he would do if he finds out who stole his money.
translation.es: Me pregunto qué harási descubre quién lo robó.

translation.en: Put the fucking money back in the bag.
translation.es: Pongan el maldito dinero en el bolso.

translation.en: -[Brenda] All of it. -[Mace] Get it in!
There ain't no reason to tell him about all this, huh?
translation.es: No hay razón para contarle todo esto, ¿no?

translation.en: I'll think about that when I'm driving away.
[Hammers] If Mr. Cross or any of his friends decide to show up,
translation.es: Si el señor Crosso alguno de sus amigos decide venir,

translation.en: my wife Val is as handy with a gun as I am.
translation.es: mi esposa Val dispara tan bien como yo.

translation.en: Don't worry about him. He's friendly.
-I do not like dogs. -Even the teeny-weeny ones freak him out.
translation.es: - No me gustan los perros.- Lo asustan hasta los pequeñitos.

translation.en: Well, it's the teeny-weeny ones that have the sharpest bite.
translation.es: La mordida de esos es la peor.

translation.en: This is Kelly Freeman and her uncle Reggie. They're from California.
translation.es: Ellos son Kelly Freemany su tío Reggie, de California.

translation.en: -Ma'am. -Well, how do you do? Nice to meet you.
Oh, no, thank you. We're good.
Reggie, Kelly, lend me a hand, please.
I had to give him a shot to put him out, so he might be groggy.
translation.es: Debí darle una inyección para dormirlo,podría estar mareado.
¿Ven? El chico está sano y salvo.
- Cam.- Estás muerto, hijo de puta.

translation.en: [Kelly] Mom, uh, we are at Lucky 13 restaurant, right outside of Old Bravo, okay?
translation.es: Mamá, estamos en el restauranteTrece de la Suerte, junto a Viejo Bravo.

translation.en: Reggie just told me everything and I'm really scared.
translation.es: Reggie me contó todo y estoy muy asustada.

translation.en: Come on, baby, pick up the phone. Pick it up. Pick it up, Kelly. Pick it up.
translation.es: Vamos, cariño, atiende el teléfono.Atiende, Kelly.

translation.en: Ah, she's probably calling to say she's got the money and is on her way.
translation.es: Seguro llama para decirque tiene el dinero y está en camino.

translation.en: You have had one hell of a 24 hours, JD.
translation.es: Vaya 24 horas que tuviste, J. D.

translation.en: He didn't know I put a tracker on his car,
translation.es: No sabía que su auto tenía un rastreador.

translation.en: so he wasn't hard to find.
Son of a bitch was feeling brave.
translation.es: El maldito se hizo el valiente.

translation.en: Problem was, I had to clear out before I could find the money.
translation.es: El problema fue que tuve que irmeantes de encontrar el dinero.

translation.en: Figured I'd get it when I came back in my official capacity.
translation.es: Pensé en llevármelocuando regresara como oficial.

translation.en: But now we'll get our money back from Mrs. Freeman.
translation.es: Pero ahora nos lo dará la señora Freeman.

translation.en: Listen to me, nothing bad is gonna happen.
I will not let anything bad happen to y'all.
translation.es: No permitiré que les suceda nada malo.

translation.en: Once your mom gets here with the money, they'll let us go.
translation.es: Cuando llegue su mamá, nos dejarán ir.

translation.en: [distorted voice] We're sending you a family portrait.
Or the throat cutting starts without you.
translation.es: O empezaremos a degollar si ti.

translation.en: This is the trap for Mom, and he's using us as bait.
translation.es: Es una trampa para mamá,nos usa como carnada.

translation.en: We have to find a way out of here.
Yeah, how? This place looks like Jigsaw's basement.
translation.es: ¿Cómo? Esto parece el sótanode El juego del miedo.

translation.en: -Okay, but what if they hear us upstairs? -[Reggie] They won't.
translation.es: - ¿Y si nos oyen arriba?- No lo harán.

translation.en: This is housebreaking 101. Cam, hand me one of those rags over there.
translation.es: Allanamiento de morada para principiantes.Cam, pásame un trapo.

translation.en: Good. Wrap the rag around the end of the broom.
translation.es: Bien. Pon el trapo en la punta del palo.

translation.en: All right, take the end of it, gently press it up against the glass,
translation.es: Presiona suavementeese extremo contra el vidrio,

translation.en: directly in the middle, then give it a fast punch.
translation.es: en el medio, y luego dale un golpe seco.

translation.en: -Go ahead. Go ahead. -Can you give me a lift?
Shut the hell up, Cujo, before I whoop your ass!
translation.es: ¡Cállate, Cujo, o te daré una paliza!

translation.en: Should have warned you about my alarm dog.
translation.es: Debí advertirles sobre mi perro guardián.

translation.en: Got some good news though. Your mama's almost here.
translation.es: Pero tengo buenas noticias.Su mamá está por llegar.

translation.en: Y'all need to come back upstairs.
Sorry you got caught in the crossfire, but soon as I get my money,
translation.es: Lamento que hayan quedado en el medio,pero, en cuanto tenga mi dinero,

translation.en: -Just gonna let us go on our merry way? -That's right.
You can take this country, "aw, shucks," fake Southern hospitality bullshit,
translation.es: Puede tomaresta maldita hospitalidad sureña falsa

translation.en: and shove it right up your tight cowboy ass.
translation.es: y metérsela en su trasero de vaquero.

translation.en: I ain't gonna let you hurt these kids.
translation.es: No dejaré que lastime a estos niños.

translation.en: You gonna need to learn some respect, boy.
translation.es: Tendrás que aprender a respetar, muchacho.

translation.en: Damn, I thought she was a nice old lady.
translation.es: Vaya, creía que era una anciana agradable.

translation.en: Well, look at you, little man.
[voice wavering] We wasn't going to hurt you.
get your evil, Martha-Stewart-looking ass down them steps.
translation.es: baja tu malvado culode Martha Stewart al sótano.

translation.en: Girl, give me this weapon. Get our phones. Let's get the fuck out of this psycho house.
translation.es: Dame el arma, trae nuestros teléfonosy salgamos de esta casa de locos.

translation.en: I got you. I ain't going nowhere, okay? You hear me?
translation.es: Estoy aquí.No iré a ninguna parte. ¿Está bien?

translation.en: I promise. I ain't going nowhere.
translation.es: Te lo prometo. No iré a ninguna parte.

translation.en: Now, let's get out of here. Come on, we got to find your mom.
translation.es: Ahora salgamos de aquí.Vamos a buscar a su mamá.

translation.en: -Are you okay? -The little shit poured bleach in my eyes.
translation.es: - ¿Estás bien?- El maldito me echó lejía en los ojos.

translation.en: Good enough to hit what I aim at.
translation.es: Lo necesario para dar en el blanco.

translation.en: -[line ringing] -[Kelly] Mom, come on. Pick up please.
I think I'm almost there, but my phone is dying.
translation.es: Creo que ya llego, tengo poca batería.

translation.en: I think I can hear you but I can't see you.
translation.es: Creo que te oigo, pero no te veo.

translation.en: Mom, Reggie, he kept us all safe.
Mr. Cross is an Arizona State Trooper. He's… He's the captain.
translation.es: El señor Crosses un policía de Arizona, el capitán.
- ¿Qué?- El capitán Hammers es el señor Cross.

translation.en: And he's corrupt and evil, and his crazy wife is just as bad.
translation.es: Es corrupto y malvado,y su loca esposa es igual de mala.

translation.en: They were gonna kill all of us.
-He's what? Where are they now? -Locked in the cellar.
Wait, wait, wait! What about the money?
It stays to pay for our escape.
Come on, sis. Hammers, Cross, whatever his name is,
translation.es: Vamos. Hammers, Cross, como se llame,

translation.en: he's not gonna honor that deal.
Tell me that's your final offer.
translation.es: Dime que es tu última palabra.

translation.en: I'll put it where the schizophrenic asshole can't miss it.
translation.es: Lo dejaré a la vistadel idiota esquizofrénico.

translation.en: [Brenda] Don't start the car until I yell.
translation.es: Enciende el auto cuando te diga.

translation.en: You got this, Kelly. You got this.
-All right. Let's get this baby started. -Okay, Kelly, go.
translation.es: - Muy bien. Arranquemos a este bebé.- Kelly, ahora.

translation.en: -Reg, you're gonna have to fix this. -I'm on it.
translation.es: - Reg, tendrás que arreglar esto.- Estoy en eso.

translation.en: [Cam] I think it's the fan belt.
translation.es: Creo que es la correa del ventilador.

translation.en: -You a smart kid, you know that? -Thanks.
Become a scientist when you grow up. Help change the world for the better.
translation.es: Hazte científico cuando crezcas.Haz del mundo un lugar mejor.

translation.en: -Make Uncle Reg proud. -I got you, Uncle Reg.
translation.es: - Hazme sentir orgulloso.- Claro, tío Reg.

translation.en: Can we just keep driving until we get to Grandma's?
translation.es: ¿Seguimos hasta la casa de la abuela?

translation.en: -Get down! -I think I got their attention.
-[Brenda] Oh, my God! -Take this. It's us or them.
translation.es: - ¡Dios mío!- Ten. Somos nosotros o ellos.

translation.en: Come on, Mom. Focus and squeeze, like Grandpa taught you.
translation.es: Concéntrate y dispara,como te enseñó el abuelo.
Nadie se mete con mi familia.

translation.en: -[kids] Hell yeah. -Yeah, but keep driving. Don't slow down.
translation.es: - Claro que sí.- Sí, conduce. No te detengas.

translation.en: -Missed me, motherfucker! -[Brenda] Reggie, keep it steady.
Stop the car! Reg, stop the car!
You want me? Just take me.
Like shooting fish in a barrel.
-Jump, kids! Get out, now! -[Kelly] Cam, go!
It's over now. It's over now.
Drive this car and do not stop until you hit Texas.
translation.es: Conduce este autoy no te detengas hasta llegar a Texas.

translation.en: Listen, uh, y'all ain't got to worry about the check. I got it covered.
translation.es: No se preocupen por la cuenta. Pago yo.

translation.en: And come up off this syrup, Kelly.
No! I see your eyes darting. What did you do, Reggie?
Enough to give us a new start.
That's right, and there's more where that came from.
translation.es: Sí. Y hay más donde estaba eso.

translation.en: Yeah, you know, waffles, they taste best when you load 'em with lots of syrup.
translation.es: Sí, los wafles saben mejorcuando los cubres de jarabe.

translation.en: And butter. Got to have butter.
Wait, yeah, Mom. Give it back to who?
We can't exactly take out an ad.
Cam, Kelly, do not look at him like that. He is not a good role model.
translation.es: Cam, Kelly, no lo miren así.No es un buen ejemplo.

translation.en: Excuse me, I'm a great role model.
We gotta give this money back to…
Looks to me like you've been outvoted, big sis.
translation.es: Me parece que somos mayoría, hermana.

translation.en: So eat. Your food's getting cold.
translation.es: Así que come. Se te enfría la comida.

translation.en: Let's put this money away. We don't need no problems.
Texas ain't got nothing on Arizona.
